This app offers: This app offers more than just a collection of recipes - it is designed to be your very own digital cookbook. You can easily save and retrieve your own recipes at any time.
Name: Name
What to cook?: "What to cook?" is not only a recipe app, it is, in fact, your cookbook. You can add your own recipes to save them for the future.
Way to enjoy: way to enjoy a variety of fresh ingredients in one satisfying meal
Database of recipes: Database of recipes that can be replenished
Flexible search: Flexible search for desired and unwanted ingredients
Ability to add: Ability to add your own recipes with photos
Subscribe up to our newsletter. Be in to: Subscribe up to our newsletter. Be in touch with latest news and special offers, etc.
